meanings.definition: A name used to gain access to a computer system or online service.
meanings.sent1: My username for the game was 'CoolDude123'.
meanings.sent2: Please enter your username and password to log in.
meanings.sent3: I tried using 'SuperStar' as my username, but it was already taken.
meanings.sent4: Her username was like a key that unlocked the virtual world.
meanings.sent5: Remember your username like you remember your own name.

meanings.definition: A unique identifier used by an individual to log in to a website or application.
meanings.sent1: The username 'TechGuru22' was already in use.
meanings.sent2: Don't forget your username; you won't be able to log in without it.
meanings.sent3: His username was so long that he kept mistyping it.
meanings.sent4: The username acted as a secret code to access the exclusive content.
meanings.sent5: Choose a username that reflects your personality and interests.
